scripts.start:windows: concurrently "cd ../back_end && npm run start:local:windows" "cd ../front_end && npm run start:local"
scripts.start:linux: concurrently "cd ../back_end && npm run start:local:linux" "cd ../front_end && npm run start:local:linux"
scripts.start:mac: concurrently "cd ../back_end && npm run start:local:mac" "cd ../front_end && npm run start:local:mac"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd ../back_end && npm run test" "cd ../front_end && npm run test -- --watchAll=false"
scripts.dependup:check: npm run dependup:check:run_locally && npm run dependup:check:backend && npm run dependup:check:frontend
scripts.dependup:upgrade: npm run dependup:upgrade:run_locally && npm run dependup:upgrade:backend && npm run dependup:upgrade:frontend
